welcome_message_body: Welcome to Bad Driburg, known for its natural beauty, charming architecture, and rich cultural history. We invite you to soak up the tranquil atmosphere and discover all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Paderborn/lippstadt Airport

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter flights

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kassel-Calden Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter and low-cost flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bielefeld Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Bielefeld Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Guetersloh Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
